verbose_text: Purslane (200 and 400 mg/kg/d) significantly decreased glucose in STZ diabetic rats only at the fourth week of the study (P <.05 and P <.01, respectively), while the highest dose of purslane (80 mg/kg/d) was significantly reduced blood glucose in diabetic rats in the beginning of the first week of treatment (P <.05 and P <.01, respectively) (XREF_FIG).
evidence: STZ diabetic rats only at the fourth week of the study (P < .05 and P < .01, respectively), while the highest dose of purslane (80 mg/kg/d) was significantly reduced blood glucose
